npc.generic.3.greeting.default: Hi %player%. How are you doing today?
npc.generic.3.talk.2: I've heard that there are places in this world where very strong monster appear.
npc.generic.3.follow.yes: Sure. Where do you want to go?
npc.generic.3.follow.no: I think I still have some things to do first.
npc.generic.3.dislike: What is this... Sorry but im not a fan of this
npc.generic.3.like: Wow %player%. Thanks for the gift. This is a nice present!
